Urgently Hiring for Mid, Senior, and Principal level engineers!-
100% Remote!-
Job Title:
Senior Software Engineer
Job Location:
100% Remote
Salary:
$120k- $200k DOE, Benefits, 401k Match
Requirements:
3-10+ years expiernece with C/C++
We are a well established and highly regarded, premium brand in consumer electronics and professional video and recording products. We have a broad lineup of innovative and high quality offerings at the professional and consumer level.
We are currently in a major growth phase and hiring for Mid, senior, and principal level engineers with strong C/C++ expeirence.
Top Reasons to Work with Us
Competitive salary ($120k - $200k)
Work Remote
Stability
Full Benefits (health, dental, vision, etc.)
401k match
What You Will Be Doing
Collaborate with other engineers, product managers, etc. to support and develop our latest generation of software
be involved in system and architecture design decisions.
Mentoring less experienced engineers
Work as part of a multi-disciplinary development team, participating in team meetings, design reviews, brainstorming sessions, and testing events
What You Need for this Position
3-10+ years software development
C/C++
Multithreading is desired
JavaScript is desired
Node is a plus
Experience leading/mentoring is a plus
BS in CS (or related) is preferred
So, if you are a Senior C++ Engineer (Remote) with experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
